packet_size.description: Packet size used for reading udp socket. Defaults to 8192

port.description: The desired port for the server. If left unset, the block will obtain an available port from nio's PortManager.

threaded.description: Dispatch a thread to handle every datagram received

host.description: The host IP for the UDP server. Defaults to '127.0.0.1'.

nio/UDPServer.Description: This block provides a UDP server that runs inside nio.
nio/UDPServer.Output: Signals with data attribute containing udp raw data received
